name: describe_table
description: Retrieve detailed information for a specific table, including its identifiers, timestamps, type, optional row count and size, and a detailed schema defining field names, types, modes, and nested fields for structured types.

table_name.description: Name of the table for which to retrieve schema information.

name: execute_query
description: Execute a SELECT query on BigQuery.

query.description: The SQL SELECT query to execute on the BigQuery database.

name: list_tables
description: List all tables in the BigQuery database, returning a list of dictionaries where each contains `table_id`, `dataset_id`, `project_id`, `type` (e.g., 'TABLE', 'VIEW'), `creation_time` (Unix timestamp milliseconds), and an optional `expiration_time` (Unix timestamp milliseconds).
